long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features Include 
- Automatic call logging with Salesforce and Redtail CRM
     - Including inbound and outbound calling with time, duration, and date
- Click to call with any phone number in the browser
- Automatic screen pops with over 50+ applications
- Call history integration with seamless call back
- Presence integration with phone system directory
- Custom speed dial directory 

The Netsapiens app allows you to click to call, receive CRM screen pops, and more right from your web-browser. With over a dozen pre-built CRM integrations and more more being added regularly you can count on our application to improve workflows, and streamline processes. Simply sign-in with your existing 1 Wire login and you will be up and running in seconds.
long.ja,zh_CN,zh_TW:
This application connects the Netsapiens soft switch to multiple third party applications in real time via APIs.

Once a user installs the extension and signs in, they can expect seamless click to dial from anywhere in Google Chrome along with database driven screen pops.

This applications offers integration to any application that operates through the Google Chrome browser. For example, some applications include but are not limited to Salesforce.com, Zendesk, Zoho, Facebook, Google, vTiger, Full Contact, and much more.
